content: a cute 6x6 wash cloth with a minimal cat head design *you will need * * us 3 / 3 25mm needles * 3mm crochet hook optional * about 25g cotton worsted yarn * darning needle * scissors *instructions * * download the pdf above for both written and charted directions * share your finished cloths on ravelry this is my first pattern and i hope you like it feel free to use my cat motif for any other projects like sweaters hats or blankets *typo * row 22 should read k7 p18 k7 this is now fixed in the pdf *typo * row 13 should read k2 p6 **k16** p6 k2 this is now fixed in the pdf
